class.p: Investigator is a detective. They've got a nose for heresy.
Distrusting eyes, kind eyes, tired eyes
Helmeted head, military cut, or bald
Plain clothes, worn outfit, or uniform
Thin body, fit body, flabby body
Your maximum HP is 8+Constitution. Your base damage is d6.

movedescription.noindent: When you give an NPC an order based on your Inquisitorial authority, roll+CHA. On a 7+, they choose one:
movedescription.p: On a 10+, you also take +1 forward against them. On a 6-, they do as they please and you take -1 forward against them.

movedescription.noindent: When you get a 7+ using Discern Realities on a crime scene you also find a clue of value to you. On a 10+ this clue gives you a hunch that the GM will describe.

movedescription.p: When you torture or manipulate someone to extract information from them roll+INT. On a 7-9 they answer your questions and you choose 2. On a 10+ choose 1 instead.

ul.li: They resist for longer than you'd planned before they begin to cooperate
They attract the attention of those nearby

movedescription.noindent: When you bring an enemy to 0 HP and attempt to disable them instead of killing them, describe how and roll+STR. On a 10+ they are incapcitated in the way you describe. On a 7-9 the same but they get one last attack in.

class.p: Show mercy or leniency to an enemy.
Hurt someone more than you need to.
Try something that's so crazy it just might work.
__________ knows much about the enemy's ways, I should use that knowledge.
__________ walks a thin line too close to sedition, I should guide them.
__________ has helped me defeat a formidable foe, I should repay them in kind.
class.noindent: You start with Field Rations (1 weight)

ul.li: Leather Armor, Chainmail (1 armor, 1 weight, Worn, 10 thrones)Shield (+1 armor, 1 weight, Worn)

li.span: Flak Armor (2 armor, 2 weight, 50 thrones, Worn)

span.title: When your data slate contains just the right file for the subject you’re spouting lore on, consult the file, mark off a use, and take +1 to your roll.

Field gear is a collection of useful mundane items such as chalk, poles, spikes, ropes, etc. When you rummage through your field gear for some useful mundane item, you find what you need and mark off a use.
A hand-held scanning device capable of reading various signatures through a solid surface. The range is fairly limited and it might not always give the most detailed readouts.

class.p: When you level up you may take a new advanced move either from your class or from the general list of advanced moves.

movedescription.p: When you call out a target as your own, you deal +2d4 ongoing to them. This lasts until an ally attacks them, you attack someone else, or the target is defeated. While this is active you deal -4 damage to other targets and your allies deal -2 damage to your named target.

move.movedescription: When you put the word out that you're after a specific person or organization before pursuing them, roll+CHA. On a 10+ hold 2, on a 7-9 hold 1. You may spend hold to get an automatic 10+ on rolls that directly involve your target. Proceed with caution, they know you're coming.

When you listen closely to someone roll+WIS. On 7-9 the GM will tell you one thing they're lying about – if anything. On a 10+ the same and take +1 forward when acting on that information or against that person.
When you roll a 7+ with Confessor you may choose to select zero options from the list. If you do so, roll+Int – on a 6- your captive dies.
